channel.title: Can NEVER connect
channel.description: I've been able to play MoparScape exactly 3 times. I have been able to play on other people's servers like twice. Every other time is says "Error connecting to server.Must be down. Click cancel and then start server to make your own" ya ya... Well even if I start my own it wont work. What pisses me off is I can use the server once, then it logs me off when I'm playing and I can't log back in! Help me.. I've been 'trying' to use MoparScape and I've looked into it for a few months, and I know I just signed up for the forums but what ever >_< What do I have to do. I've tried everything reasonable, but I can play it sometimes, and not at other times, so help my out :(

item.title: Can NEVER connect
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

did connecting to another server ever cross your mind?

item.title: Can NEVER connect

I’ve been able to play MoparScape exactly 3 times. I have been able to play on other people’s servers like twice. Every other time is says “Error connecting to server.Must be down. Click cancel and then start server to make your own” ya ya… Well even if I start my own it wont work. Help me… I’ve been ‘trying’ to use MoparScape and I’ve looked into it for a few months, and I know I just signed up for the forums but what ever >_< What do I have to do. I’ve tried everything reasonable, but I can play it sometimes, and not at other times, so help my out
